res: Please tick the corresponding checkbox on the left side.
Please either tick the radio button or provide your answer in the text box below.
Please provide more details in the text box on the right side.
This field is applicable only if you provided at least one "No" answer.
Please specify who prescribes the oncologic therapy in the text box below.

radio.label: RESPONDENT_TYPE
radio.exec:
''' endos = ['K_228777c8e8', 'K_0izlf82c34', 'K_77blbaszki', 'K_kokkn4dccx', 'K_r0aobchoyj', 'K_gj7832ivxn'] neuros = ['K_bb04361f3b', 'K_ca8e9b46ce', 'K_901f2b6fc8', 'K_859f7d00e7', 'K_b9y4sas3cr', 'K_f1fee5r576', 'K_b39tom0rkc', 'K_6ee85a8cbd', 'offlistNeuroOnc', 'offlistNeuroOnc2', 'offlistNeuroOnc3']
if identifier in endos or identifier == "Test1": RESPONDENT_TYPE.val = RESPONDENT_TYPE.r1.index elif identifier in neuros or identifier == "Test2": RESPONDENT_TYPE.val = RESPONDENT_TYPE.r2.index '''

html:
As shared, we would like you to complete a 15-minute questionnaire as a homework task ahead of the main interview. Weâ€™ll compensate you an additional $50 for your time. The information collected will help focus our discussion on what is most relevant to your experience with VHL disease.
Please complete the task today.

pipe.label: S1_TEXT
pipe.case: For patients with VHL disease with pNET, which of the following are you, personally, involved in?
For patients with VHL disease with CNS hemangioblastoma, which of the following are you, personally, involved in?

checkbox.label: S1A
checkbox.title: [pipe:S1_TEXT]

text.label: S1B
text.title: [pipe:S1_TEXT]
text.comment: Please be as specific as possible

checkbox.label: S2A
checkbox.title: At your practice/institution, which specialists are involved in the care of patients with VHL disease who have ccRCC, pNET, or CNS hemangioblastoma manifestations?

text.label: S2B
text.title: For patients with VHL disease with pNET, which of the following are you, personally, involved in?
text.comment: Please be as specific as possible

col.label: c1
col.b: Describe your interaction with this specialty, if applicable

radio.label: S3
radio.title: For an active patient case, how frequently do you coordinate efforts with the other specialists or multidisciplinary team who are involved in treating patients with VHL at your practice/institution?

pipe.label: S4_TEXT

textarea.label: S4
textarea.title: [pipe:S4_TEXT]
textarea.comment: (Describe any monitoring, surgical/procedural, prescription and non-prescription therapy, including off-label.)

radio.label: S5A_STYLE
radio.title: Hidden question for defining style at S5

pipe.label: S5_TEXT
pipe.case: Who is the primary decision maker when it comes to the treatment of patients with VHL-associated pNET?
Who is the primary decision maker when it comes to the treatment of patients with VHL-associated CNS hemangioblastoma?

radio.label: S5A
radio.title: [pipe:S5_TEXT] ${S5A_STYLE.selected.text}
radio.comment: (Select one - if it differs based on the treatment describe below.)

radio.label: S6
radio.title: What is your comfort level prescribing oncologic treatments?

radio.label: S7A
radio.title: In your practice/at your institution, do you currently prescribe? If no, who prescribes oncologic therapy?

text.label: S7B
text.title: In your practice/at your institution, do you currently prescribe? If no, who prescribes oncologic therapy?
text.row: If no, who prescribes oncologic therapy?
